parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: The name of the domain that contains the created repository.

parameters.name: repository
parameters.description: The name of the repository to create.

parameters.name: upstreams
parameters.description: A list of upstream repositories to associate with the repository. The order of the upstream repositories in the list determines their priority order when CodeArtifact looks for a requested package version. For more information, see Working with upstream repositories. (dict) --- Information about an upstream repository. A list of UpstreamRepository objects is an input parameter to CreateRepository and UpdateRepository. The name of an upstream repository.

nested_params.name: repositoryName
nested_params.description: The name of an upstream repository.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: One or more tag key-value pairs for the repository. (dict) --- A tag is a key-value pair that can be used to manage, search for, or filter resources in CodeArtifact. The tag key. The tag value.

nested_items.name: repository
nested_items.description: Information about the created repository after processing the request.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the repository.

nested_items.name: administratorAccount
nested_items.description: The 12-digit account number of the Amazon Web Services account that manages the repository.

nested_items.name: domainName
nested_items.description: The name of the domain that contains the repository.

nested_items.name: domainOwner
nested_items.description: The 12-digit account number of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the domain that contains the repository. It does not include dashes or spaces.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the repository.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A text description of the repository.

nested_items.name: upstreams
nested_items.description: A list of upstream repositories to associate with the repository. The order of the upstream repositories in the list determines their priority order when CodeArtifact looks for a requested package version. For more information, see Working with upstream repositories.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of an upstream repository.

nested_items.name: externalConnections
nested_items.description: An array of external connections associated with the repository.

nested_items.name: externalConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the external connection associated with a repository.

nested_items.name: packageFormat
nested_items.description: The package format associated with a repository's external connection. The valid package formats are:
npm: A Node Package Manager (npm) package.
pypi: A Python Package Index (PyPI) package.
maven: A Maven package that contains compiled code in a distributable format, such as a JAR file.
nuget: A NuGet package.
generic: A generic package.
ruby: A Ruby package.
swift: A Swift package.
cargo: A Cargo package.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the external connection of a repository. There is one valid value, Available.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that represents the date and time the repository was created.
